thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Majestic
thread.title_full: Majestic - Review of Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: meenakshii0629
title: Majestic
text: If you want to experience true European luxury and French hospitality. You need to stay in this hotel. I don't know where should I start from. The service, ambience, food everything is just too if the line. We had a meal in the cinq restaurant and that was an experience - simply awesome. I love the flowers in the lobby and they make the day so special. One more experience - try and make a booking through the reservation department, you will get to know what is true customer service. It's been a while I forgot the name of the lady and my apologies. She was outstanding worth every penny when you stay here. Going back in June again
